Package database

Class DataBaseManager

java.lang.Object
database.DataBaseManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DataBaseManager extends Object implements Serializable
Class DataBaseManager - manages data related to files, clients and products from the supermarket

      Returns:

    • createAccount

      public Client createAccount(String name, String address, String email, int phoneNumber, Date birthday)
      Creates a new client and adds the client to the clientList where it can be managed or written into an object file
      Parameters:

      address - - address
      email - - email
      phoneNumber - - phone number
      birthday - - birthday date
      Returns:
      - null if email isn't valid or if there was an error

      Returns:
